name: SHAIKH YOUSUF ALALAGHI
description:
Sheikh Yousuf Alalaghi with us in the center, as a teacher of the Holy Quran.

He holds a license (Ijaza) from the Libyan Ministry of Awqaf to teach the Holy Quran.

Ma Shaa Allah, he has been teaching the Holy Quran for more than 17 years, and many students memorized the Holy Quran under his supervision and teaching, praise be to Allah.

He also participated in many arbitration committees for many competitions at Tripoli municipality, which is the place where he live.

It is really a blessing from Allah, the Almighty that Sheikh Yousuf will be one of the supervisors and teachers of the Holy Quran.
